overview.en: Meshx is a decentralized IoE ecosystem, in which numerous mesh-based network access points cooperate and coordinate with each other. It features with high-speed bandwidth, dynamic self-organizing, self-configuring, self-maintenance,and etc, as well as has other characteristics such as rapid deployment、easily deployment、easily installment 、non-line-of -sight(NLOS) transmission,etc.
overview.zh: 打造去中心化万物互联生态的区块链
